column4: are you sure? I hear there are a lot of proggies that don't get installed with an upgrade, like the new update manager and stuff
or is that only if you haven't uninstalled the ubuntu-desktop stub package like I have? ^_^
you're probaly right... the set of packages might be slightly different... but a quick round of apt-get should solve it.
that's interesting; I didn't know it was that easy.
